Nguyen Tu

Nguyen Tu

SUMMARY 
● I graduated University of Science in October 2014 in Ho Chi Minh city. 
● Certificates about Android developer of information technology center of Science University in June 2014. 
● I can work alone and team-work very well. 
● Research new technologies fast. 
● Responsibility with my work doing. 
● Email: caybangmuathuqn@gmail.com 
● Phone: 0974107528 
TECHNICAL SKILLS

• Frameworks/ Platforms: NODE.JS, Android studio, Xcode 
• Database Management Systems: MySQL 
• IDEs: Eclipse, Android studio, Xcode, Visual studio code 
• Tools or Tools source control: SVN and Git 
• Foreign Languages: English
